Description: Elliptical palm leaf basket, with painted black and red chequer patterns on the exterior.
Curator's comments: Found with .5555.2 Found with .5555.3 Found with .5555.4

For a range of baskets from Deir el-Medina, see Gourlay, Les sparteries de Deir el-Medineh (DFIFAO 17, 1981), esp. pl.22 On basketry in ancient Egypt, see Wendrich, “Basketry” in P.T. Nicholson and I. Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology, 254-67.
